19709.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>You're doing great <pc>. I
tried asking around, but alas, no
luck.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19710.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「な:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>What is this, Rubecca's detective
game? What are you looking for if you
want to ask about lullabies?<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19711.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「バ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Barbasa, do you know any lullabies
with lyrics about hearing voices or
being swallowed by darkness?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19712.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「お:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Oh, that's the song, isn't it? I think
I sang it to Rubecca when she was
little.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28478.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「昔:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Thinking back to the old days, let's
sing a little.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19713.<center>ねーむれ～ よい子よ ねーむれ～。\nねーむれ～ 今すぐ ねーむ:
Nemure~ Good boy, Nemure~ Nemure~
Nemure right now~ I'll hear you if you
don't sleep~

28437.<center>おまえが死ぬと～ 聞こえる あの声～。\n命の～ 輝きが 闇に呑:
When you die~ I hear that voice. That the brightness of life will be swallowed by darkness. So, my dear
boy...

28438.<center>名前を～ 呼ばれる その前ーに～。\nねーむれ～ 今すぐ ねーむ:
Before you call my name~ Sleep~ Now,
sleep~

19714.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「昔:
It used to be sung a long time ago, but the children found it creepy. Before I knew it, they stopped singing
it.

19715.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「お:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>You will die. The spark of life is
consumed by darkness. That's it. It's
a lullaby.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19716.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「バ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Barbasa, do you know anything else
about that lullaby?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19717.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「は:
Huh. My mother, who sang this song to me, told me that it was written by a traveling poet who stopped by this
village a long time ago.

19718.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>The poet traveled around the world and
wrote songs based on what he heard on
his travels.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19719.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>That means there must have been some
kind of event that inspired this
lullaby, right?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19720.<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>「お:
<start_lip_sync n00438 _normal m00001>Perhaps after Leen Village, the poet
went to Julet Town in search of new
material.<stop_lip_animation n00438 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19721.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Is it possible, then, that some of the
elderly people in Julet might know the
poet?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19722.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ん:
Hmmm... I know this information is a bit unreliable, but maybe you could talk to some of the old folks in Julet
Town and find out what they know about the traveling poets.

19723.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「私:
I'll go with you, but if I don't, Dad will make too much noise, so I'll get permission to go out. go
ahead of me.

28479.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><p:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001><pipipi_low>Hmmm. Perhaps you found some clues
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28480.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ち: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Hey, let me borrow it. I'll read it!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28481.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
Julet Town, a row of shell houses. Lovers gathering on the beach. Songs of love. Songs of farewell. Scented
sea breeze. Songs of the sea.

28482.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「ふ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Hmmm. This notebook seems to be filled
with possible subjects for songs.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28483.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「あ: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Oh, I see what you mean!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28484.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>This is true!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28485.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>This is an important clue! I'm so
proud of you for finding it. Keep this
as a thank you.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28486.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「こ:
If this is the notebook of the poet who came to Leen Village, it must contain the events that inspired that
lullaby! If we can find it.

28487.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「あ: <start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>There it is.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28488.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Leen Village. interesting story. Girl
Calls Death, a fearful villager.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28489.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>A villager who dies at the call of her
name. What is the language of death
that the girl uses?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28490.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>dies. The sparkle of life is swallowed
by darkness.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28491.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I knew it. That wasn't something I had
heard in my head.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28492.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>You know <pc>. I know this is
going to sound weird, but I want you
to hear me out.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28493.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「私:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>In my head. Sometimes I hear a girl's
voice.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28494.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>will die. The spark of life is
swallowed by the darkness.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28495.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「な:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>It was kind of creepy. I tried to
think it was just my imagination.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28496.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「だ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>But when I saw that the girl's name
had been deleted from the Old Villager
List, I had a very bad feeling.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28497.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「昔:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I remembered a lullaby I used to
listen to that had the same words as
the voice in my head!<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28498.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「私:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>It's probably this girl's voice that I
hear in my atma.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28499.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「な:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>Why are you talking to me? Who the
hell is this girl?<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

28500.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「村:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>What happened to this girl that her
name has been erased from the villager
list.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19724.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「…:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>I am going to look into this girl from
now on. When I do, please lend me your
help again.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19725.<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>「だ:
<start_lip_sync n00405 _normal m00001>But right now I just want to go home
and get some rest. <pc> See
you soon.<stop_lip_animation n00405 CLOSE_MOUTH>
